contentTypes.name: Call To Action
contentTypes.description: A Call To Action draws the user's attention to a particular button that you want them to click on.

validations.message: Must be a hex value (ex: '#EEE' or '#FFAA55')

contentTypes.name: Divider
contentTypes.description: A Divider just puts a separator between elements.  This can be a `<hr />` HTML element, or sometimes a Pipe character `|` depending on the context.

contentTypes.name: Dropdown Menu
contentTypes.description: A Dropdown Menu can be attached to a main menu to show additional menu items on click.

contentTypes.name: Faq
contentTypes.description: A faq is a question + answer pair used in the Faq section on a page

contentTypes.name: Form Field
contentTypes.description: A Form Field represents a piece of information you want to collect from a user via a Form.

contentTypes.name: Menu
contentTypes.description: A Menu contains a number of Menu Buttons or other Menus, which will be rendered as drop-downs.

validations.message: The items must be either buttons, drop-down menus, or dividers.

contentTypes.name: Menu Button
contentTypes.description: A Menu Button is a clickable button that goes on a Menu.  It has a link to a Page or a URL.

validations.message: A Menu Button should have a very short text field - ideally a single word.  Please limit the text to 60 characters.
The external link must be a URL like 'https://www.watermark.org/', a mailto url like 'mailto:info@watermark.org', or a relative URL like '#location-on-page'
The Page Link must be a link to a Page which has a slug.
The icon should start with 'ion-', like 'ion-arrow-down-c'.  See http://ionicons.com/

contentTypes.name: Migration History
contentTypes.description: System Type - Do Not Modify

validations.message: Must be a hex value (ex: '#EEE' or '#FFAA55')
The ministry website must be a full URL to a separate web page
Must be a string of a-z, A-Z and/or 0-9 with no spaces or special characters.

contentTypes.name: Page
contentTypes.description: A page describes a collection of sections that correspondto a URL slug

validations.message: The slug must look like the path part of a URL and begin with a forward slash, example: '/my-page-slug'
This can be a Ministry or Conference.

contentTypes.name: Partner Church
contentTypes.description: A Partner Church represents a church which offers one or more Watermark ministries or classes.

contentTypes.name: Section: Block Text
contentTypes.description: Markdown free-text block

contentTypes.name: Section: Contact Us
contentTypes.description: A Contact Us section contains a Form with several Form Fields.  The responses to the form will be collected and provided to the appropriate administrator.

contentTypes.name: Section: Ministry or Conference Header
contentTypes.description: A Ministry or Conference Header section includes the Ministry or Conference's colors and logo, to be displayed at the top of a page related to that Ministry or Conference.

contentTypes.name: Section: FAQ
contentTypes.description: A FAQ Section contains a number of question and answer pairs (FAQs) curated by the administrator.

contentTypes.name: Section: Featured Items
contentTypes.description: Display a row of cards

validations.message: Hero text should be no longer than 150 characters

contentTypes.name: Section: Image Gallery
contentTypes.description: An Image Gallery Section displays a rotating gallery of severalimages in a horizontal row on the page.

contentTypes.name: Section: Marquee Text
contentTypes.description: Display a large section title and an enlarged single paragraph along with an optional tagline at the top.

contentTypes.name: Section: Ministry Details
contentTypes.description: A Ministry Details section provides additional information about the ministry, in long-form text and tabular format.  Typically this appears directly following the Ministry Or Conference Header.  An optional testimonial callout or call to action can be attached.

contentTypes.name: Section: Partner Churches
contentTypes.description: A Partner Churches section is used to display the logos of the partner churches participating in a particular Watermark ministry.

contentTypes.name: Section: Shopify Product List
contentTypes.description: The Shopify Product List displays products that are available for purchase via Shopify.

contentTypes.name: Section: Testimonials
contentTypes.description: A Testimonials section can show one or many Testimonials written by leaders, partners, or members who have participated in the Ministry or Conference.

contentTypes.name: Section: Video
contentTypes.description: Full width video with a title

contentTypes.name: Section: Video Highlight
contentTypes.description: Highlight a video with some text

contentTypes.name: Site Config
contentTypes.description: This is the top level object for the configuration of your site.

validations.message: We only allow the default site config for this site

contentTypes.name: Testimonial
contentTypes.description: A Testimonial must be attached to a Testimonial Section to be displayed.

validations.message: Your image needs to be bigger!  Lots of people have high resolution displays.  Please submit an image at least 480 by 480 pixels.

Your image needs to be compressed!  Typically, large high quality images should be kept between 100 and 60 Kilobytes. Smaller images should be closer to 30 Kilobytes and lower.  Think of the poor souls who only get 1GB/mo of 3G!

settings.helpText: What should others associate with this conference? (ex: 'Marriage Enrichment')
If you don't set a menu label, this is the text that will appear on the button that opens the dropdown menu.  If you do set a menu label, that will control the text.
Provide a URL to something on another website, a `mailto:` link to an email address, or a deep link into an app.
This is the short name of the ministry, example: 're|generation' or 're|engage'.
What should others associate with this ministry? (ex: 'Marriage Enrichment')
Value provided by Shopify. May also be called the "Storefront ID".
Make this the primary page for a ministry or conference.
Select which type of object, i.e. Ministries, Conferences, etc., should be displayed here.
Choose one of the available styles for this Section.
Choose one of the available styles for this Section.
You must crop images at aspect ratio "4:3" to be displayed properly. All images must be at least a 1000px wide.
This is only used to help you find the section in Contentful.
This is a special value that comes from Shopify.  Open a helpdesk ticket to have us set the appropriate value for your Shopify collection.
Ministries, Conferences, etc. which are publicly visible should be attached here.  Any Ministry or Conference that is not attached here is hidden - it will not appear in search results.
